Content.Text:
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's rare for you to make a mistake.
You surprised me!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I know. I surprised myself, and not in
a good way! Sorry about that, Charles.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>. Are you here to see Allen?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>, you're here?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want to know what's happened here?
I came in for my regular 'stash trim,
but got less change than normal.
<PAGE>
Allen didn't mention that the price had
gone up, so I came back to check with
him.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It turns out he messed up and gave me
the wrong change. Which, as I just said,
is quite a rare occurrence!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Charles, I'm really sorry. I'll make
sure this never happens again.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't have to worry about it, Allen.
Everyone has their bad days.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
...

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's all from me! I'll see you both
later.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I can't believe I got someone's change
wrong. If it had been someone other than
Charles it could have been big trouble!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, please just leave me alone. I'm
sorry, but I don't feel like making time
for you today.
Leave
Stay

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
How could I do that? Gah!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I must vow to never make the same
mistake again, that's all! Now I need to
try and take my mind off it.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Please, <MYNAME>. Just leave.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
...Go! I don't like persistent women!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't want anyone around me at times
like this, either. Go on, go.
What will you say to Allen?
Let's eat something nice!
Let's go see some beautiful scenery!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
...
<PAGE>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You're only saying that
because you're hungry, right?
<PAGE>
Bringing up food at a time like this 
makes me more shocked than angry!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Okay. Genovese Pasta. I don't want to
go out, you can make it in that kitchen
there.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
And.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Well.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
...Thanks.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Forget it. You're hearing things!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Everything tidied away?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll take you home. Let's go.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
Look at the time. It's against
everything I stand for to let my cute
Princess walk home alone.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Don't worry about that other thing.
Here, I'll even apologize. Sorry.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't feel like going out. My pride
won't allow me to, not when I feel like
this.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Please, <MYNAME>. Just go home.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I need a change of pace. Gotta get out
of this funk!
